description:
When the girls learn the idol festival "Love Live!" is going to be held, they immediately set their sights on performing. The girls force their way into a meeting with the director to receive permission to enter, who agrees to grant them permission if none of them fail their final exams. Meanwhile, Umi runs into a girl watching a video of a μ’s concert in front of the school. It was her older sister, Eli, who filmed the video and uploaded it to the site. Unable to understand why Eli refuses to accept μ’s, Umi goes to consult student council vice president Nozomi...
Source: crunchyroll
